_header: Why have thee no ruth on my child
Subjects: Virgin Mary, appeal of, to the Jews; Virgin Mary, compassion of
_description: The Appeal of the Virgin Mary to the Jews — two quatrains in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Wy haue ȝe no reuthe on my childHaue reuthe on me ful of
                    murnig…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Als loue me bindet to my soneso lat vs deyȝen boþen
                    i same
